altername_name: 仮面ライダー クライマックスヒーローズ フォーゼ
name: Kamen Rider Climax Heroes Fourze
overview: The riders have been protecting world peace in the last 40 years, now's the moment to see who's the strongest, and which duo can deal the most destructive damages. Riders throughout the decades meet in the Climax Heroes Fourze, even the newest hero in the series join in the fray. Besides engaging in a huge fight, every hero has their own set of missions. Choose the hero who you grew up with, or try out the new fighters with the cool gadgets. For each mission you clear, you get Riders Point. Store them up to unlock new routes, characters and weapons. The Nintendo Wii version allows gamers to choose their difficulty settings.
